Q253.description: Respect for individual human rights nowadays
questions: How would you describe the level of respect for individual human rights nowadays?
To what extent do you think individual human rights are respected in today's society?
In your opinion, how much respect is given to individual human rights these days?
When it comes to individual human rights, how would you assess the level of respect currently?
options: A great deal of respect for individual human rights

questions: How proud are you of your nationality?
